title: League not working
body: I recently bought a new computer with a chrome based system, I am trying to download the game but the game can only be downloaded from a windows or apple based system, Is there any way I could change my computers system?

replies.body: If you received a device like a Chrombook, then it may not support League.  Not just with installation but support as well, as it may not support the [recommended steps](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements).  You'll need to use a Mac or PC operating system to get League installed.  Let me know if that clears things up!
